title: ISketchPatternFeatureData.FeatureScopeBodies
description: Gets the bodies in this multibody part to be affected by this sketch-driven pattern feature.
returns: Array of bodies to be affected
remarks:
This property is valid only if
ISketchPatternFeatureData::GeometryPattern
is true.
Call
ISketchPatternFeatureData::SetFeatureScope
to set this property.
For more information, see the
Sketch Driven Patterns PropertyManager
topic in the SOLIDWORKS Design user-interface help.
